document.full_text: japan confronted devastation along its northeastern coast on saturday, with fires raging and parts of some cities under water after a massive earthquake and tsunami that likely killed at least 1,000 people.
document.title: daybreak reveals huge devastation in tsunami-hit japan
lines_and_colors: japan confronted devastation along its northeastern coast on saturday, with fires raging and parts of some cities under water after a massive earthquake and tsunami that likely killed at least 1,000 people.
